title: BRICS Summit 2026
description: The annual summit bringing together leaders from Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa to discuss economic cooperation and development.

title: Youth Innovation Forum
description: A gathering of young innovators and entrepreneurs to showcase their ideas and startups.

title: Cultural Exchange Festival
description: Celebrating the diverse cultures of the BRICS nations through art, music, and dance.

title: Tech & Trade Expo
description: Exhibiting the latest technological advancements and fostering trade relationships among member countries.

title: Academic Conference on Sustainable Development
description: Scholars and researchers discuss strategies for sustainable growth and environmental protection.
